item.title: Hello World
item.description: As I’m getting older it’s harder for me to remember things while I realize there are more things I need to learn. Improving my memory is important. Jotting things down so that I can revise later is also a good alternative. Go is a powerful programming language, and has been my “main” programming language for a few years by the time this post is being written. I’m excited to learn Hugo, and hopefully I can create something fun with it.
